name: Firefox - Tab Quicktip
description:
Displays tab name (website page title) upon tab hover. Designed for larger numbers of tabs and darker background themes. With style applied, Firefox system tooltips are disabled for tabs only. 

Screenshot shows Firefox system tooltip and the same hover with a Quicktip. NOTE: Additional information regarding some style variance and other notes available in the More Info section (below).

Design based upon previous similar style for Bookmark Quicktip. http://userstyles.org/styles/48331/ff4-bookmark-quicktip
additional_info:
06-05-2011
The default values for the Tab Quicktip color scheme are transparent background, white text and black text shadow. While this works well for darker themes, a color adjustment reversal to black text with white text shadow is suggested for lighter color themes.

Upon testing, 42 pixels was selected for the fixed tab width. Although tested with other minimal tab size styles, usually styles combining the tab favicon and the close button, some difficulty arose when selecting a tab without accidentally closing. A section has been provided and commented in the code containing the settings for a smaller, 30 pixel tab, which is the same default size for the 'Open a new tab' button.

06-25-2011 - Tested functional with FF5.
09-30-2011 - 09-30-2011 - Tested functional for FF7.
